column4: Here comes the next problem, following the info on the FAQ i tried to install RealPlayer but i get this error: ./RealPlayer10GOLD.bin: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.5: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Following the info on the FAQ i tried to install RealPlayer but i get this error: ./RealPlayer10GOLD.bin: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++.so.5: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory -- What should i do?
So i take it no one knows the answer?
I have had the same problem. I couldn't solve it myself - are you trying to use it on a 64bit machine?
